plot: Confined to a wheelchair, Otto prays for the day when he can get revenge on the men who brutally attacked his wife and daughter.
title: Nekdo tam dole me má rád
plot_es: Confined to a wheelchair, Otto prays for the day when he can get revenge on the men who brutally attacked his wife and daughter.
original_name: Nekdo tam dole me má rád
plot_en: Confined to a wheelchair, Otto prays for the day when he can get revenge on the men who brutally attacked his wife and daughter.
